summary: Support XR research studies by guiding participants through study procedures and ensuring high data quality.
Collect and verify data in accordance with strict research protocols while maintain participant confidentiality.
Troubleshoot prototype hardware and software issues on test devices, log bugs, and communicating blockers to the internal team.
Track equipment usage, perform test device checks, and maintain inventory to ensure operational readiness.
Collaborate with data quality analysts and engineers to provide feedback that improves data integrity and study workflows.

Operated and maintained heavy-wheeled military transport vehicles supporting forward brigade operations. Safely transported personnel, ammunition, supplies, and critical equipment in diverse operational conditions.
Served as communications representative ensuring proper operation of radio and Joint Capabilities Release (JCR) systems.
Coordinated logistics, vehicle readiness, and mission execution within high-pressure environments.
achievements: Driver & Mechanic Badge w/ Mechanic Clasp
